info.name: LioDen, Simple Purple
info.description: Another simple colors layout, this time purple. Images for background and main lion BG in den were made in Krita by myself.
info.additionalInfo: I highly recommend disabling user CSS/HTML in Den Descriptions. There's an option to turn them off, and I suggest doing so if you're to use this or any style for LioDen's whole site. Other CSS in dens will conflict with this otherwise. Change Log 11/8/17 Fixed some things, like elements not showing after refreshing/loading a page. 5/5 Fixed unread messages highlight color.
